summary: Gamma Match Designer Feature: Backend API 9/9 tests pass. Frontend modal working correctly. Button visible when Gamma feed selected, modal opens with correct antenna info, Auto Design returns full recipe with HARDWARE, TUNING SETTINGS, charts, and notes. Custom Hardware toggle reveals input fields.

issues: Custom hardware input fields have data-testid attributes but they're styled as native TextInput with placeholder 'auto' - visible in expanded view screenshot but not immediately obvious to user

success_rate.frontend: 100% (modal opens, shows results, custom hardware toggle works)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Gamma Designer feature complete and tested. Modal accessible via 'Gamma Match Designer' button in Feed Match section when Gamma feed type is selected. Backend returns recipe with null_reachable, bar_sweep, insertion_sweep arrays.

backend_test_results.test_custom_hardware_1inch_tube_05inch_r: PASSED - 1" tube/0.5" rod returns null_reachable=false with warning
backend_test_results.test_custom_feedpoint_impedance_differen: PASSED - 30Ω feedpoint gives different bar than default
backend_test_results.test_bar_sweep_array_valid: PASSED - bar_sweep array has valid ascending data
backend_test_results.test_insertion_sweep_array_valid: PASSED - insertion_sweep array has valid ascending data
backend_test_results.test_invalid_geometry_tube_smaller_than_: PASSED - Tube ID < rod OD returns error
backend_test_results.test_calculate_regression: PASSED - /api/calculate still works with geometric K model

frontend_test_results.modal_opens_with_correct_antenna_info: PASSED - Elements, Driven Length, Frequency displayed
frontend_test_results.auto_design_shows_charts: PASSED - BAR POSITION vs SWR, ROD INSERTION vs SWR
frontend_test_results.custom_hardware_toggle_reveals_inputs: PASSED - Tube OD, Rod OD, Spacing, Teflon Length, Feedpoint R
